# ApolloElement

Custom Element base class for apollo custom elements.

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: The latest data for the query from the Apollo cache

attributes.name: error
attributes.description: The latest error for the query from the Apollo cache

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: If the query is currently in-flight.
